content.html: * Access control who can do pull requests & peer reviews. * Remove staff engineers and implement an architect office that approves and designs changes. * Invert architecture, if microservices go monolith. * Implement n+ programming languages not fit for purpose. * Scale agile.
content.value:
* Access control who can do pull requests & peer reviews.
* Remove staff engineers and implement an architect office that approves and designs changes.
* Invert architecture, if microservices go monolith. 
* Implement n+ programming languages not fit for purpose.
* Scale agile.
